name: 1024 x 2048
description:
A puzzle game tapping into the binary roots of the electronic devices all around us, 1024x2048 is a fun and exciting challenge for everyone to enjoy. Incorporating Game Center, you can challenge friends and track your ranking. You'll be amazed by how much fun you can have with some simple swiping and number matching.

Originally inspired by Threes by Asher Vollmer and 1024 by Veewo Studio, based on 2048 by Gabriele Cirulli.
